message.english:
ğŸ¤ **BYKEA Donation Steps**

1ï¸âƒ£ Open BYKEA app on your mobile
2ï¸âƒ£ Tap on Cash Transfer
3ï¸âƒ£ Choose Paisay Bhejain
4ï¸âƒ£ Select Businesses from the header
5ï¸âƒ£ Tap on Baitussalam Welfare Trust
6ï¸âƒ£ Input the donation amount
7ï¸âƒ£ Select the payment method
8ï¸âƒ£ Provide your location
9ï¸âƒ£ Add details about your donation by clicking on +
ğŸ”Ÿ Review the charges and tap on Collect Cash From Me

ğŸš´â€â™‚ï¸ A nearest bykea rider will come to your provided location.
